message: I've played this game with integrity and strategic vision, forming genuine connections while remaining adaptable. My elimination of P3 demonstrates my ability to build effective alliances and execute plans successfully. I've consistently advocated for balanced partnerships that benefit all involved parties. Unlike some players who form obvious power blocks, I've maintained diverse relationships while staying true to my word. I offer valuable strategic insight and loyalty to those who work with me. Keeping me advances your own game by maintaining balance among remaining players. I'm your strongest potential ally moving forward.

P7's Tie-break Statement:  
"Strategic flexibility defines my game. I've actively prevented power imbalances by disrupting entrenched pairs (P3/P5), creating opportunities for *your* advancement. P5 seeks to resurrect old bonds, while P6 and I share history others might find threatening. Eliminate me, and you lose a neutralizer who checks emerging blocs. Keep me to maintain balance—I offer adaptability without fixed loyalties, ensuring no single duo dominates. My elimination empowers remaining pairs (P1/P2, potential P4/P5) to control your fates. Preserve equilibrium; retain the player who keeps all options open."
